public abstract class LockableEntityPersister

Abstract base class for entity persisters that support locking.

lock

public java.lang.Object lock(java.io.Serializable id)
Locks an object for the given identifier returning the locked instance
throws:
CannotAcquireLockException Thrown if a lock couldn't be acquired before the default timeout elapsed
Parameters:
id - The identifier
Returns:
The locked object

lock

public java.lang.Object lock(java.io.Serializable id, int timeout)
Acquire a lock using the given identifier and timeout delay
throws:
CannotAcquireLockException
Parameters:
id - the identifier
timeout - the amount of time to wait before giving up in seconds
Returns:
The locked object
